settings.left_content:
Robbie Antonio, the Founder and CEO of Resident Holdings Group, is a real estate developer, tech entrepreneur, and art patron. Being one of the biggest stalwarts in the field of consumer branding, he has worked with various celebrities and influencers for worldwide projects representing twenty (20) companies in the fields of property, financial technology, educational technology, e-commerce, home accessories, beauty, fashion, jewelry, food, electronics and gaming.


REAL ESTATE AND PROPERTY TECHNOLOGY

Currently, Antonio has (eighty-two) 82 million square feet worth of developed, in-progress, and managed properties under his belt. He is the Founder and President of Antonio Development in New York where he had the opportunity to work with Pei Partners and the late I.M.Pei for Centurion‚Äîthe first ground up residential condominium in the world. He also served as the Managing Director of Century Properties where he conceived and spearheaded US $2.1 billion of branded developments with the Trump Organization, Armani Casa, Versace Home, Philippe Starck, Missoni Home, and Paris Hilton.

Antonio is also the Founder and CEO of Revolution Precrafted, the first and only unicorn startup in the Philippines. It is a global supplier of traditional and prefabricated homes and structures with footprints in (thirty-one) 31 countries within Asia, Middle East, Europe, North and South America, and the Caribbean.

Another company under the Resident Holdings Group is the Rogue Resorts, a travel tech company which offers luxurious condo villas, vacation resorts, and a curated membership app.

In May 2018, he was named ‚ÄúReal Estate Personality of the Year‚Äù by PropertyGuru. In the same year, Antonio was also cited in the 2018 Mavericks Report by BuiltWorlds as one of the ‚Äú25 Pioneers Who‚Äôve Transformed the Built Industry.‚Äù

As of this writing, Antonio has worked with (thirteen) 13 Pritzker Prize Architects and firms such as Zaha Hadid, Jean Nouvel, Philip Johnson Alan Ritchie Architects, Rem Koolhaas, Tadao Ando, and Christian de Portzamparc. He also collaborated with designers such as Ron Arad, Campana Brothers, Tom Dixon, and Marcel Wanders. He has partnered with over (one hundred and three) 103 notable brands in various fields such as fashion, Hollywood, luxury, design, and art. He has established the largest number of luxury-branded real estate products and properties across the globe by teaming up with athlete Amar'e Stoudemire, singer and designer Lenny Kravitz, style icon Daphne Guinness, and supermodel Helena Christensen with Camilla St√¶rk.


TECHNOLOGY & BRANDING

Robbie Antonio‚Äôs experience in brand marketing reaches new heights as he launches his umbrella company: the Resident Holdings. Under the Resident Holdings Group are fast-growing marketplaces and e-commerce companies. Under the new conglomerate company are Renegade Branding Concepts, Renaissance Touch, Relevant Medium, and Reach Medium.

Renegade Branding Concepts is a one-stop shop for franchising and licensing concepts which offers an unparalleled list of possible retail and business opportunities in partnership with some of the biggest celebrities while Renaissance Touch is a first-of-its-kind online celebrity/influencer e-commerce site for furnishing and decorating interior spaces. For these new ventures, Antonio is currently working with popular celebrities and influencers such as the world boxing icon Manny Pacquiao and Brazilian-Japanese model Daniel Matsunaga to name a few. Relevant Medium is a platform that enables social media influencers to create and monetize content while Reach Medium is an aggregated Key Opinion Leader (KOL) content curator, e-commerce, and traffic engine.

In the coming months, Antonio is set to unveil his other celebrity-designed e-commerce companies including: Rebel Specs Design‚Äîa celebrity-branded eyewear e-commerce company that features sleek, top-notch design with unbeatable prices, Radical Couture Concepts‚Äîa company that features the latest celebrity backed fashion trends at affordable prices, Regal Jewelry Selection‚Äîa curated e-commerce jewelry brand that sells gorgeous celebrity branded rings, necklaces, earrings, and bracelets, Radiant Beauty Selection‚Äîan e-commerce company that provides beauty products with categories, Replenish Corporation‚Äîthe premiere celebrity-inspired nutrition and vitamin e-supplements company, Range Hi Tech Corporation‚Äîa celebrity branded cell phone provider and marketplace app that helps merge function with fashion, and Revolt Games‚Äîan interactive cross-platform gaming company that features celebrity branding and an immersive, best-in-breed gaming experience.

On top of his achievements in the fields of real estate and e-commerce, Antonio is venturing towards e-services with upcoming companies such as Reform Legal Services‚Äîa legal marketplace that serves the underserved, matching lawyers with SME clientele and consumers to remove latent frictions in the traditional legal industry, Rejuvenate Service Corporation‚Äîa proprietary technology that matches local doctors with patients in need and features predictive analytics that help diagnosis, prognosis, and post-treatment follow-ups, Reconcile Corporation‚Äîa proprietary technology that filters by industry sector and accounting specialty, bridging trade needs while helping accounts and financial advisors grow their book of business, RACE‚Äîa digital media and live entrepreneurship platform that helps broach traditional education with pragmatic, money-making skills, RIPE Discount Card‚Äîa discount membership card that let everyday consumers buy more for cheaper and helps support local small businesses, and Resurgent Corporation‚Äîthe premiere direct selling company in the market featuring (seven) 7 product packages and an interactive app that gamifies, intensifies, and ultimately commercializes the entire marketing experience.


ART

Robbie Antonio is one of the youngest and most prolific collectors of international modern and post-war contemporary art. Because of his accomplishments as an art collector, he has received numerous awards from different organizations. In 2014, Artnet recognized Antonio as one of the ‚Äú20 of the World‚Äôs Most Innovative Art Collectors,‚Äù while in 2015, he became part of Artnet‚Äôs ‚ÄúTop 200 Art Collectors Worldwide.‚Äù Artnet also recognized him as one of the ‚Äú12 Young Art Collectors to Watch in 2016,‚Äù as well as one of the ‚ÄúThe World‚Äôs Top 100 Art Collectors for 2016.‚Äù

Antonio‚Äôs passion for art has also led him to collaborate with artists such as Damien Hirst, Takashi Murakami, Marina Abramovich, Maurizio Catellan, Julian Schnabel, Francesco Clemente, Zhang Huan, David La Chapelle, Marilyn Minter, and Julian Opie.


AWARDS
  • ‚ÄúReal Estate Personality of the Year‚Äù by PropertyGuru
  • ‚Äú25 Pioneers Who‚Äôve Transformed the Built Industry‚Äù
  • Forbes ‚ÄúPhilippines‚Äô 50 Richest 2017‚Äù (youngest person)
  • ‚ÄúThe World‚Äôs Top 100 Art Collectors for 2016‚Äù by Artnet
  • ‚ÄúArt Power List: Movers and Shakers in the Art World‚Äù by Harper‚Äôs Bazaar
  • ‚Äú12 Young Art Collectors to Watch in 2016‚Äù by Artnet
  • ‚ÄúTop 200 Art Collectors Worldwide in 2015‚Äù by Artnet
  • ‚ÄúTop 10 Young Art Collectors‚Äù by Larry‚Äôs List
  • ‚Äú20 of the World‚Äôs Most Innovative Art Collectors‚Äù by Artnet
  • ‚Äú50 of the World‚Äôs Most Exciting Collectors‚Äù by Modern Painters
  • ‚ÄúThe Collectors: 40 Under 40‚Äù By Apollo Magazine
  • ‚Äú25 Most Influential Personalities‚Äù by the Philippine Star
  • ‚Äú50 Under 50‚Äù by Town & Country
  • ‚ÄúReal Estate All stars in New York‚Äù by Real Estate Weekly, New York
  • ‚ÄúTop 40 Rising Stars of Real Estate Globally‚Äù by Institutional Investor Magazine at the age of 28

PRESS MENTIONS

ABC8 News, ABC6 News, ANC, Apollo, Architectural Digest, Architectural Record, Art Net, Billionaire Magazine, Billionare.com, Bloomberg Asia, Bloomberg Philippines, Bloomberg, Business World, Business Standard, Casa Vogue, China Daily, Christie‚Äôs, Clad News, CNBC Asia, CNBC Singapore, CNN Philippines, CNN, Commercial Observer, Cyprus News, Deal Street Asia, Designboom, Dezeen, Domus, Dubai Forum, Dwell, Elle D√©cor, Entrepreneur Philippines, Esquire, Euro Weekly, Exberliner, Fashion Times, Fast Co Sign, Fast Company, Financial Times, Forbes Asia, Forbes Philippines, Forbes, Forbes.com, Fortune, Fox8, Glam.com, Harper‚Äôs Bazaar, Haute Living.com, Hollywood Reporter, Hongkong Tatler,How To Spend It, Huffington Post, Inquirer.net, Institutional Investor News, Intelligent Collector, L.A. Times, Le Monde, Man Report Residential, Miami Herald, Monocle, MSN, Myanmar Times, NY Times, Opportunities.com, Pagesix, Papermag, Prestige Singapore, Private Air Luxury Homes, Private Equity, Property Report, Real Estate Weekly, Reuters, Robb Report, Sea Asia, Smart Company, Sotheby‚Äôs, Surface Magazine, Tech Collective, Tech Insider, Techwire in Asia, Telegraph, The Art Gorgeous, The Art Newspaper, The Business Times, The New York Condo Blog, The New York Times, The Straits Times, The Wall Street Journal Asia, The Wall Street Journal, Today in New York, Town & Country, Tribune.net, Vanity Fair, Venture Canvas, Ventures Onsite, Vogue, Vogue.com, Vulcan, W Magazine, Wallpaper* Magazine, WWD & Yahoo News, Harper‚Äôs Bazaar Interiors, GQ Middle East, GQ India, Prestige Malaysia, Prestige Thailand, L‚ÄôOfficiel Brazil among others.

settings.question_faqs: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
settings.answer_faqs:
Please make sure that you follow below steps:

1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file: ella-3.0.0-sections-ready.zip in the folder Ella Sections Ready 3.0.0, then you just need to upload ella-3.0.0-sections-ready.zip file to your Shopify store.

settings.question_faqs: What I have to do when I need your support?
settings.answer_faqs:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to support@halothemes.com

settings.question_faqs: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed

settings.question_faqs: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to support@halothemes.com, we will give you our quote. Thank you.

settings.question_faqs: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.

settings.question_faqs: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).

settings.question_faqs: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.

settings.question_faqs: What is included in the theme package?
settings.answer_faqs: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.

settings.question_faqs: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
settings.answer_faqs: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.

settings.question_faqs: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don‚Äôt want to scale the image.

settings.question_faqs: Can I add borders around our product images?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.

settings.question_faqs: Can I have multi level menu?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.

settings.question_faqs: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
settings.answer_faqs: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark ‚ÄúUrgent‚Äù in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.

settings.question_faqs: Does the theme support Variant Image?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://sneake-demo.myshopify.com/products/sample-proin-de-corper-nulla-dan-melementum-1?variant=10214763888684

settings.des_faqs: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to¬†support@halothemes.com
